Title: Limits who may bring a private right of action for identifying a victim of a sex offense; only brought by the victim where the information has not otherwise been publicly disclosed
Summary: Limits who may bring a private right of action for identifying a victim of a sex offense; only brought by the victim where the information has not otherwise been publicly disclosed.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to limiting who may bring a private right of action for identifying a victim of a sex offense
